name: dependabot-drupal-mrn
description: Generates release notes for Drupal dependencies in Dependabot PRs

scripts.verify-dist: npm run build && (git diff --exit-code dist/ 2>/dev/null || (echo '❌ dist/ is out of date. Run npm run build and commit.' && exit 1)) || echo '⚠️  Not in a git repository. dist/ has been built.'

author: Matt Glaman
